detachmentRule.name: rain of cruelty
detachmentRule.lore: Few warriors in the galaxy are as adept at launching punishing skyborne raids as the Drukhari. Before their prey even realise the peril, the killers of Commorragh are amongst their lines like grinning ghouls. Splinter fire lays low defenders still scrambling into position. Quicksilver assaults leave dozens screaming in maimed agony. Often, the battle is over before it has even truly begun.
detachmentRule.description: Each time a DRUKHARI unit from your army disembarks from a TRANSPORT, until the end of the turn, that unit’s ranged weapons have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and that unit’s melee weapons have the [LANCE] ability.

enhacements.name: Phantasmal Smoke
enhacements.lore: Phantasm grenade launchers, elegantly worked into the curved hull plates of their Raiders, discharge in covering patterns. Hallucinogenic vapours conceal the advancing Drukhari and confuse their foes’ aim.
enhacements.description: DRUKHARI model only. While the bearer’s unit is wholly within 6'' of a friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT, models in the bearer’s unit have the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability.

enhacements.name: Sadistic Fulcrum
enhacements.lore: Witnessing this murderous warrior wreaking havoc, the sadistic crew of the Drukhari anti-grav transports are filled with the vigour only the suffering of others can provide
enhacements.description: DRUKHARI model only. Each time you expend a Pain token to Empower the bearer’s unit in the Shooting phase, you can select one friendly DRUKHARI TRANSPORT within 3'' of the bearer’s unit; until the end of the phase, that TRANSPORT is also Empowered.

enhacements.name: Spiteful Raider
enhacements.lore: This cruel realspace raider knows the best reason to take something from the foe is for the simple spite of denying them that which they most desire to keep.
enhacements.description: DRUKHARI model only. Each time the bearer’s unit destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase, if that enemy unit was within range of one or more objective markers when the bearer’s unit was selected to fight, you gain 1 additional Pain token.

enhacements.name: Nightmare Shroud
enhacements.lore: This strange Drukhari artefact wreathes its bearer and their allies in a cloying cloud of unnatural shadow. Flitting into battle under cover of this pall, they are nigh impossible for the prey to see coming.
enhacements.description: DRUKHARI model only. Each time the bearer’s unit disembarks from a TRANSPORT, until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at the bearer’s unit.

stratagems.name: vicious blades
stratagems.lore: Wielding a horrifying array of hooked boarding blades, barbed lariats and other specialised tools of agony, these warriors hack and slash at their foes even as their transport skims low overhead.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: wraithlike retreat
stratagems.lore: Employing smoke grenades, paralysing mists or simple cunning and agility, these warriors slip away like spectres.
stratagems.when: Any phase, when a TYRANIDS unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within 6'' of that destroyed unit.
stratagems.effect: Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit within 6'' of your HARVESTER unit (See Feed the Swarm).

stratagems.name: pounce on the prey
stratagems.lore: Incredible alien agility and a delight in taking wild risks help these warriors to leap acrobatically from their skimming transports directly into battle.
stratagems.target: One HARVESTER unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
stratagems.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

stratagems.name: skyborne annihilation
stratagems.lore: These warriors are well versed in raining suppressing fire on the foe even as they close with them from on high, shredding defences and leaving the survivors easy prey for the raid.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, or the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead if it is a KABALITE WARRIORS unit.

stratagems.name: swooping mockery
stratagems.lore: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move
stratagems.when: One DRUKHARI TRANSPORT from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9'' of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
stratagems.target: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Your TRANSPORT can make a Normal move of up to 6''

stratagems.name: night shield
stratagems.lore: These powerful Drukhari devices occlude their raiding vehicles not only from physical sight but also targeting sensors and even psychic senses.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One DRUKHARI VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.
